name: ResQButton
0:
”Alexa, ask ResQ Button for my PIN”
”Alexa, ask ResQ Button to find my phone”
”Alexa, ask ResQ Button where is my ipad”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: rescue button
Developer Terms of Use
des:
ResQ Button is a cloud backed Panic Button hardware provider. 
Forgot where you kept your phone, Just say "Alexa, ask ResQ Button to find my phone", you can add additional family members phone so you can ring them. For e.g. "Alexa, ask ResQ Button to find john's phone".
Bought a Panic ResQ Button Hardware skip user guide, Just say "Alexa, tell ResQ Button I bought a Panic Button" to walk you through setup instructions
In case of Android Phone's in silent mode, we will turn on the ringer for the Find My Phone.
